title: April Ryan | Trump Wants to "Cause Chaos" in the Democratic Primary: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's desperation to get involved in the 2020 Democratic primary.

Then, journalist April Ryan talks about the difficulties of being a black woman covering the White House, the lack of empathy from the Trump administration and heckling Sean Spicer. She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G just for this podcast.


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
